text: Puyang (濮阳) is a prefecture-level city in northeastern Henan province, China. It is on the northern shore of the Yellow River. == Administration == Puyang administers 1 district and 5 counties. *Hualong District () *Puyang County () *Qingfeng County () *Nanle County () *Fan County () *Taiqian County () Category:Cities in China Category:Henan
title: Puyang
